content.html: Getting out of a depression feels a bit like unlocking new abilities in a game. When you're under, you know the ability's there but you just can't use it. Most recent gain is 'getting up without hitting snooze' That's been inaccessible for years. Meds & sunshine ftw!
content.value:
Getting out of a depression feels a bit like unlocking new abilities in a game. 

When you're under, you know the ability's there but you just can't use it.

Most recent gain is 'getting up without hitting snooze'

That's been inaccessible for years. Meds & sunshine ftw!
